name: Ciel nosurge DX
description: A "communication" game in which you interact with Ion, a young girl who has lost her memories, in a world beyond the 7 dimensions, which happens to be connected via a terminal. By engaging in daily activities with Ion, you eventually arrive at her spirit world, and help her recover her memories little by little. Embark on a journey to learn why she is alone here, and where this world beyond the 7 dimensions is.
